ErrorCode.name: DateOutOfRange
ErrorCode.description: The given year/month/day date is out of range. The month must be in the range [1,12] and the day must be in the range [1,32[

ErrorCode.name: CannotOpenDevice
ErrorCode.description: The device that wants to be accessed cannot be opened

ErrorCode.name: TelescopeAlreadyMoving
ErrorCode.description: The desired action cannot be performed since the telescope is already being moved
